caption:
The photograph features a prominent circular sign with the text "UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE MAXIMUM PURCHASE 10 GALLONS" against a vivid blue sky. The sign seems to relate to a fuel restriction, likely set during a time of shortage. The scene includes a person crouching near the rear of an older model car, which is positioned next to a fuel pump at a gas station. The person appears to be interacting with the carâ€™s fuel tank, possibly filling it up with gas.

In the background, there are multiple fuel pumps visible, indicative of a typical gas station setup. The surroundings suggest a clear, sunny day due to the bright lighting and shadows cast on the ground. The overall ambiance of the image emits a somewhat tense or regulated atmosphere due to the imposition of fuel limits, contrasting with the otherwise ordinary task of filling up a car. The dots or reflections on the image could be artifacts from the photographic process or lighting, adding a slightly abstract layer to the otherwise straightforward scene.
title: 'Sign of energy crisis'
